languages.text: "Перевозка, развертывание, вся волокита с {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Адептус Администратум{/g}... и все ради непредсказуемого результата. Люди, особенно плохо снаряженные и обученные, хрупки — особенно против малоизученного противника".

traits.locale_text: "Перевозка, развертывание, вся волокита с {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Адептус Администратум{/g}... и все ради непредсказуемого результата. Люди, особенно плохо снаряженные и обученные, хрупки — особенно против малоизученного противника".

languages.text: "Transportation, deployment, the unending bureaucracy of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g}... all to achieve an unpredictable result. People are frail, especially when poorly equipped and trained, and facing an unfamiliar opponent."
languages.original_text: "Перевозка, развертывание, вся волокита с {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Адептус Администратум{/g}... и все ради непредсказуемого результата. Люди, особенно плохо снаряженные и обученные, хрупки — особенно против малоизученного противника".

traits.locale_text: "Transportation, deployment, the unending bureaucracy of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g}... all to achieve an unpredictable result. People are frail, especially those poorly equipped and trained — and facing an unfamiliar opponent."

"Transportation, deployment, the unending bureaucracy of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g}... all to achieve an unpredictable result. People are frail, especially those poorly equipped and trained — and facing an unfamiliar opponent."

"Transportation, deployment, the unending bureaucracy of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g}... all to achieve an unpredictable result. People are frail, especially when poorly equipped and trained, and facing an unfamiliar opponent."

"Transportation, deployment, the unending bureaucracy of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g}... all to achieve an unpredictable result. People are frail, especially when poorly equipped and trained, and facing an unfamiliar opponent."

"Transportation, deployment, the unending bureaucracy of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g}... all to achieve an unpredictable result. People are frail, especially when poorly equipped and trained, and facing an unfamiliar opponent."

languages.text: “运输、部署、{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}帝国内政部{/g}没完没了的官僚主义……这一切所能实现的，仅仅是不可预知的结果而已。人类很脆弱，尤其当装备与训练不足的情况下，面对陌生的敌人时，更是如此。”
languages.original_text: "Transportation, deployment, the unending bureaucracy of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g}... all to achieve an unpredictable result. People are frail, especially when poorly equipped and trained, and facing an unfamiliar opponent."

traits.locale_text: “运输、部署、{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}帝国内政部{/g}没完没了的官僚主义……这一切所能实现的，仅仅是不可预知的结果而已。人类很脆弱，尤其当装备与训练不足的情况下，面对陌生的敌人时，更是如此。”

languages.text: «Transporte, despliegue, la eterna burocracia del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g}... y todo para obtener un resultado incierto. La gente es frágil y voluble, especialmente cuando está mal equipada y se enfrenta a un enemigo desconocido».
languages.original_text: "Transportation, deployment, the unending bureaucracy of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g}... all to achieve an unpredictable result. People are frail, especially when poorly equipped and trained, and facing an unfamiliar opponent."

traits.locale_text: «Transporte, despliegue, la eterna burocracia del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g}... y todo para obtener un resultado incierto. La gente es frágil y voluble, especialmente cuando está mal equipada y se enfrenta a un enemigo desconocido».

languages.text: 「輸送、配備、{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}帝国行政局{/g}の終わりのない官僚主義…結局達成する結果は予測不可能だ。特に装備や訓練が不十分で、不慣れな相手と対峙する場合、人は弱いものだ」
languages.original_text: "Transportation, deployment, the unending bureaucracy of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g}... all to achieve an unpredictable result. People are frail, especially when poorly equipped and trained, and facing an unfamiliar opponent."

traits.locale_text: 「輸送、配備、{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}帝国行政局{/g}の終わりのない官僚主義…すべては予測不可能な結果を達成するためです。特に装備や訓練が不十分で、よくわからない敵に直面すると人は弱いものです」
「輸送、配備、{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}帝国行政局{/g}の終わりのない官僚主義…結局達成する結果は予測不可能だ。特に装備や訓練が不十分で、不慣れな相手と対峙する場合、人は弱いものだ」

languages.text: « Le transport, le déploiement, l'écrasante bureaucratie de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g}... tout cela pour un résultat des plus incertains. Les gens sont vulnérables, surtout lorsqu'ils sont mal équipés et confrontés à un adversaire inconnu. »
languages.original_text: "Transportation, deployment, the unending bureaucracy of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g}... all to achieve an unpredictable result. People are frail, especially when poorly equipped and trained, and facing an unfamiliar opponent."

traits.locale_text: « Le transport, le déploiement, l'écrasante bureaucratie de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g}... tout cela pour un résultat des plus incertains. Les gens sont vulnérables, surtout lorsqu'ils sont mal équipés et confrontés à un adversaire inconnu. »

languages.text: "Transport, Einsatz, die endlose Bürokratie des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g} ... und das alles für ein unberechenbares Resultat. Menschen sind schwach, vor allem wenn sie schlecht ausgerüstet und ungebildet gegen einen unbekannten Feind vorgehen."
languages.original_text: "Transportation, deployment, the unending bureaucracy of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g}... all to achieve an unpredictable result. People are frail, especially when poorly equipped and trained, and facing an unfamiliar opponent."

traits.locale_text: "Transport, Einsatz, die endlose Bürokratie des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g} ... und das alles für ein unberechenbares Resultat. Menschen sind schwach, vor allem wenn sie schlecht ausgerüstet und ungebildet gegen einen unbekannten Feind vorgehen."

languages.text: "Ulaşım, konuşlanma ve {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum'un{/g} bitmek bilmeyen bürokrasisi... Hepsi de öngörülemeyen bir neticeye ulaşmak için. İnsanlar zayıftır, bilhassa da yetersiz donanımlı ve eğitimli olduklarında ve aşina olmadıkları bir düşmanla yüz yüze geldiklerinde."
languages.original_text: "Transportation, deployment, the unending bureaucracy of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g}... all to achieve an unpredictable result. People are frail, especially when poorly equipped and trained, and facing an unfamiliar opponent."

traits.locale_text: "Ulaşım, konuşlanma ve {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Adeptus Administratum{/g}'un bitmek bilmeyen bürokrasisi... Hepsi de öngörülemeyen bir neticeye ulaşmak için. İnsanlar zayıftır, bilhassa da yetersiz donanımlı ve eğitimli olduklarında ve aşina olmadıkları bir düşmanla yüz yüze geldiklerinde."

languages.original_text: "Transportation, deployment, the unending bureaucracy of the Adeptus Administratum... all to achieve an unpredictable result. People are frail, especially when poorly equipped and trained, and facing an unfamiliar opponent."
